q: In an interview with ABC news on the eve of the book's release, Donald Rumsfeld said,`` What you know today can help you unthink your thinking about tomorrow.'' Donald Rumsfeld said, It can't help you with things you were thinking about back then, and added,`` Back then there was reasonable confidence that[ Saddam Hussein ] had these weapons.''

.`` There has crept in our society and our public dialogue, a coarseness, a nastiness, an attack of people who don't share the same views as you do,'' he said. All sorts of nastiness. And it is not just politicians who are doing this to each other, and, frankly, politics has always been a contact sport in this country. but with all of the cable channels and talk radio and blogs, especially blogs, where people can be anonymous with their nastiness, I think has caused a level of coarseness in our society that we've all got to think about. Colin Powell said he thought Barack Obama was making an effort to reach across political divides to tone down the rhetoric and urged members of Congress to do the same. Hillary Clinton Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.), who recently took over Hillary Clinton 's former seat on the Senate Armed Services Committee, also worried today about decreased funding of the Marines: The Marine Corps must have the resources it needs to respond to new and emerging cyber threats and terror threats in different parts of the world. Secretary Robert Gates will explain his vision to the committee next week, and I look forward to working with him to ensure the Marine Corps is well-positioned to respond to the new security demands that will continue to emerge, Kirsten Gillibrand said in a statement. turned on to it,'' said NBA deputy commissioner Russ Granik , who was at Philadelphia's First Union Center on Wednesday night, when Allen Iverson scored 54 points to Vince Carter 's 28 in the 76ers' 97-92 victory. For better or worse, fans like it when you get superstars going against each other. People have been hearing about these guys for years now, but they haven't gotten this far before where they met each other at this level. That gets people interested. With the NBA's overall popularity declining and new rules designed to make the game more appealing set to take effect next season, an Iverson-Carter matchup is what the league really needed.`` Watching these two kids,

Celtics on Tuesday night.`` Winning this game puts a lot of pressure on us, because if you can beat a team like this, then you can beat all the other teams,'' Allen Iverson said. We have enough talent to scare some people, but we just have to bring it night in and night out. The Nuggets even beat the Celtics at full strength-- kind of.
